questions.quote: Hey, Babe, your boss called. You owe five bucks for a balloon bouquet. Yeah, he says you can just give it to him tomorrow when you see him.
No, no, I was just thinking out loud I don't want my picture on a card.
Course, I wouldn't, I mean uh, the guy is uh, well obviously  the guy has his problems.
I can see the can if you're in the army, but fresh fruit it's available, it's there, it's 2 aisles over.
You stuck your hand out, so I shook it. I don't know about a pact. Anyway, you should be happy you're engaged. You're getting married.
Are you kidding? They were merciless! What do you expect when your name rhymes with a part of the female anatomy?
Do you know how hard it's getting just to tell people I know you?
Look, I'll go downtown to Chinatown with him, but that is it!
Trust me, Kramer. Given the legal opportunity, I will kill you.
What did they put on this tuna? Tastes like a dill, I think it's a dill.
